long_description: The easy-to-fly Prism Designs Flip kite is as stable as a traditional kite. But give the line a tug and watch the rotor spin like there's no tomorrow. Ripstop nylon sails are lightweight yet tough for long-lasting performance. Rugged fiberglass frame is lightweight and compact to carry but durable enough to withstand a hard landing. Prism Designs Flip kite collapses and packs flat for easy transport. Includes kite, 200 ft. of line and instructions.
short_description: The easy-to-fly Prism Designs Flip kite is as stable as a traditional kite. But give the line a tug and watch the rotor spin like there's no tomorrow.
